select b.* from (select rownum board_no, b.* from (select * from bOrder where order_email=#{keyword} order by order_date asc) b order by board_no desc) b where board_no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
select count(*) from bOrder where order_email=#{keyword}
select Max(order_num) from bOrder where order_email = #{order_email} and order_count = #{order_count}
mapper.insert: insert into bOrder ( order_num, order_email, order_name, order_phone, order_date, order_product, order_color, order_count, order_amount, order_pay, deliv_name, deliv_phone, deliv_zipcode, deliv_address, deliv_detailaddress, deliv_memo ) values ( (select concat(to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd'), (select lpad((select count(*) from bOrder where to_char(order_date, 'yymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd')), 3, '0') from dual)) order_num from dual), #{order_email}, #{order_name}, #{order_phone}, sysdate, ( select p_name from bProduct where p_num = #{order_product} ), #{order_color}, #{order_count}, #{order_amount}, #{order_pay}, #{deliv_name}, #{deliv_phone}, #{deliv_zipcode}, #{deliv_address}, #{deliv_detailaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliv_memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
